name: I love CBD (Cannabidiol) Long Sleeve
description:
>>15% of profits from every sale will be donated to ProjectCBD.org!
>>Printed on AnvilOrganic Model 429 Unisex T's 
>>Certified Organic under Oeko-Tex® Standard 100.

---

What is CBD and how does it have medicinal value?

"Cannabidiol (CBD) is a compound in cannabis that has medical effects but does not make people feel “stoned” and can actually counter the psychoactive effects of THC. After decades in which only high-THC Cannabis was available, CBD-rich strains are now being grown by and for medical users.

Scientific studies underscore CBD’s potential as a treatment for many conditions, including chronic pain, diabetes, cancer, cardiovascular disease, alcoholism, PTSD, schizophrenia, antibiotic-resistant infections, rheumatoid arthritis, MS, epilepsy, and other neurological disorders." - ProjectCBD.org

-----

     This shirt was designed for many purposes, but they all have to do with furthering the discussion and implementation of Cannabis. We are especially passionate about the current roar of the medical side of the topic, due to the cannabinoid known as Cannabidiol, a.k.a. CBD, briefly explained above. 

     The design was created around the idea that simply wearing this shirt will increase one's potential of engaging in public conversation, connecting with like minded individuals, educating friends and family, or at the least to reveal your passion for Cannabis.

name: Stonehenge Apparel LOGO T - Male
description:
Introducing our first official logo design! This shirt debuted at Dazed & Confused Arts & Music Gathering on 04/20/13 to celebrate our 3 year anniversary! 

The design features the mathematically correct layout of the stonehenge in Wiltshire overlayed onto the flower of life. The center boasts a cascading, scaled, and spiraling tetrahedron cube which follows the beautiful Fibonacci ratio. At the focal point, we show our meld with Metatrons Cube. To top it off, we've placed this vortex of creation and love energy directly on the heart.

The Male shirt is screen printed using discharge on 100% certified organic cotton t's.

The Female shirt is screen printed using discharge on recycled cotton t's.

name: Sold Out - USA - United Medical States of America - *REDESIGN COMING SOON*
description:
-=We took the rest of our white UMSoA shirts out of inventory to give out for free at an upcoming event! Check our Facebook page @ facebook.com/stonehengeapparel for more info.=-

United Medical States of America T-shirt is here! Printed on un-dyed white unisex T's with Earth friendly water based ink!

This activist themed shirt depicts each medical state in the star field of the USofA's flag. Each leaf represents 1 of the 16 current medically legal Cannabis states. The green stripes represent the take over of cannabis! Maybe one day we'll have one with all green stripes. Much love to all!
